Type.Name: FileUtils
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A simple file IO utility class
Docs.remarks: Contains a single static method GetFileContents(string filename) which returns the contents of a text file as a string.

Docs.summary: Returns a string containing the contents of the text file passed as the 'filename' parameter.
Docs.param: The file GetFileContents() should retrieve its result from. An object of type
Docs.returns: Returns the contents of a text file. An object of type
